show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: New Congress, Old Politics
content:
The 113th Congress is seated today — in the aftermath of contentious negotiations on the so-called fiscal cliff and the... <!--more--> prospect of continuing partisan acrimony on debt, tax and austerity measures related to the national budget and other leftover domestic and foreign-policy issues.
The people worry: “Will this Congress shake off its do-nothing past?” “Will legislators actually carry out our wishes?” “Will President Obama do the right thing(s)?” The real question, says Utrice, is: “Are we prepared for battle?
” Because that’s what the next four years are going to be.
